quotesystem.add.offline: Only moderators may add quotes when the stream is offline.
quotesystem.add.success: Added new quote from $1 with id #$2.
quotesystem.del.success: Deleted quote $1. There are $2 quotes now.
quotesystem.del.404: Could not delete quote $1... Are you sure it exists?
quotesystem.get.404: Could not find quote $1... Are you sure it exists?
quotesystem.edit.404: Could not find quote $1... Are you sure it exists?
quotesystem.quotemessage.success: Changed the message used for quotes.
quotesystem.quotedateformat.usage: Usage: !quotedateformat [format] - Lookup SimpleDateFormat in the Java 11 documentation for format info. Current format: $1
quotesystem.quotedateformat.success: Changed the date format used for quotes.
quotesystem.twitchnames-disabled: Usernames for quotes won't be validated
quotesystem.twitchnames-enabled: Usernames for quotes will validated against users who have been in chat.
